content:
ninnaal sthuthiyotu raajamakal-haa-haa-
ninvalamaayu raajabhaaminiyum.
/tninnazhakarachan mohippaan-haa-haa-
/tnin janamorkkaaykku pithrugruhavum.

bhakthar pukazhchaa bhaajaname
ninniludicchorekasuthan
thrukkaral njangalilalivaan than
pakkalapekshayanaykkenam.

mannamakalkkaayu shlo-mmo
vanneki-doothavaran
“ninnotu kooten naathan ni-
nnil than udayamathum".

akhila jagathpathiye naayaka-
naayetti ghoshiccha-
ngathi bahumaanicchu mariyaam,
valuthaam patavaayu thaan.

dyvatthin maathaa-mariyaaminnum nibiya-
nmaarkkum shleehanmaar-kkum nal sahade-nmaarkkum
sabhayin makkalkko-kkekkum kaalam thorum
enneykkum nallo-rormmayathundaa-katte.

thiruvullatthaal ka-nyakayaam mariyaa-minnul
jaathanathaaya jaathi-kkaare vazhi ne-raakki
rakshicchaval thanno-rmmaykkaunnathyam cherttha
suthanaayu sthothram praar ththikkattaval njangalkkaayu.

sveekaranam neti-dyvatthin maathaavaayu
ikshithi shaapatthe neekkiya kanyakaye!
Shaanthi kshemangal, sabhayilumengum vaanee-
taanakaathmajano-tabhyarththikkename.

kromba sraappikal than savidham vittavatharanam
cheythaa kanyaka than -udare vaanone!
Aadaamyare saatthaan-mruthiyiva thannatimayil ni-
nnettituvaan meyye-nthiya veeraa sthothram.

moraaneesho! Kurishum nin
maathyajanatthin praarththanayum
atikaleyum nin kopatthin
vatikaleyum maayccheetenam.

nirttheetaruthe parishuddhe!
Njangalkkaayullarththanaye
njangalilaardratha thonneetaan
ekaathmajanotarththikka

nayavaan pana pole thalirtthitume-haa
valarumavan lebanon kaarakil pol,
vruddhathayilumavar thalirittuthazhacchitume-haa
varddhikkumavarkku thushti pushtikalum,

orupolingum (maartthommaa)
unde melum ninnormma
uthakaname nin praarththana nin
ormmaye bahumaanicchorkkaayu.

praarththanayin samayamithallo (maartthommaa)
pathivinpati ninkoottatthalayaayu' praarththikka
impamezhum nin paattil shraddhiccheetum nin
aatukale musheppol thrukky vaazhtthanam.

ninne varicchoru thaarunnum (maartthommaa)
ninnormmaye bahumaaniccha suthanum sthothram
ninne muti chooteetunna roohaa vandyan,
nin praarththana krupayettatte njangalkkennum.

nirmmala nibimaare, raajyasuthashleehanmaare,
paapaabdhiyilengal thaazhaayvaan praarththicchituvin.

sal sahadenmaaraam dyvatthin daasanmaare
ningate praarththanakal kottakalengalkkaakatte.

lokarkkupakaaram-choriyunna mahaanidhiyaakum
vaanijaveeraa! Sveekruthane! Shlomo
rogangaleyaatti dushtaathmaakkale neekkaname
nin praarththanayaal-krupa netattengal.

sathyodyogasthaa! Neethi thikacchiha vaagdattham
cheythoru nithya jeevithamaarjjippaan,
nirnnidram nompum-praarththanayum peedayumetta
(maartthommaa) than-smruthiyil sthuthi mashihaa.

paavananibimaare raajyasutha shleehanmaara
abhyarththippin-bhoovanakshemaarththam.
Samaram maayatte-kalaham shamamaarnneetatte.
Sabhayum sutharum-sthuthi paateetatte.

nirmmala nibi shleehaa sahaanmaare! Ningalute
makutam vaanil bhakthajanam bhoovil;
mashihaathan sabhayil -shakthi valartthiya ningalute
smruthi maaniccho-nengum dhanyan thaan.

parishuddhanmaare! Ningal
praarththippin kartthaavotaayu
atikaleyum than kopatthin
vatikaleyum maayiccheetaan.

(maartthommaa) sadgunanidhiye
nin smruthi kondaatum sabhayil
anavaratham nin naathante
shamavum shaanthiyumamaratte.

chaartthum neethiye nin aachaaryanmaarum
mahimaye nin nayavaanmaarum-haa-haa--
ninnabhishikthamukham thirippikkalle
nin daasan daavee-din moolam.
/tnin puthranmaar kaatthitumenkil-haa-haa-
/ten niyamattheyum njaanupadeshicchitumee saakshiyeyum.

shuchiyotushuddhyaa beskkudishaa
sparshicchullappaadangal
pookkudyaanadvaarangal
vaanavarotthu vasikkenam.

dyvam srushticchaadatthe;
srashtaavotu thulyam srushti-
yaayu; manmayanudyaanatthil
tharu nirayil poyu vanneetu
/tnnathu kaanmaanullaanandam
/tsookshicchum kondu mevi
koorunnee'renmaar-manninuyarccha'yilaashcharyam.

nin gaathram kykkondum nin
rakthatthaal punyappettum
nidraapraapthanmaarorkka-
ppetanam-svarggeeyor shlemil
/tnee simhaasanamereettaa
/tdushtare veraakkunneram
santhushtanmaaraayavar nin valamaayu nilkkenam.

nirmmala madbahaayil kartthru-
snehaal shushrooshicchoraam
vydikare pinchellum va-
nneerenmaar devaagaare.

bhamgyaa dyvasuthaa! Ninne
shushrooshicchoru vydikare
ninnaagamana mahaanaalil
ortthu mukhaprabhayekename.

mochanamaachaaryarkkekuka-haaleluyyaa
shreshdtamathaam thanurakthangale mochanamezhuvaan
paavanabalipeedte kykalilaa-ghoshicchavaraayu
dayaraadevaalayamivayil-shushrooshicchota
raachaaryanmaar shemmaashanmaare nnivaruteyaa
/tkatabhaaram-thirumeyyaal neekki
/tpokkaname-paapam rudhira'tthaal
paateetum 'naathaa sthuthi' ennavar nin-valabhaaga.

mutikal mutanjava niranirayaayu
balipeedtatthilirippundu
nirmmalaraayu parikarmmippo
raachaaryarkkava chooteetum.

aachaaryeshaa! Mashihaa! Koodaashakalarppiccho
raachaaryanmaarkkekuka punyam naathaa sthothram.

makkalilappan krupa cheyvathu pole - haaleluyyaa
bhakthanmaaril dyvam krupa cheyyum.
/tpullinu thulyam naranute naalkalaho-haaleluyyaa
/tpookkunnithu vayalil poo-ccheti pole.

sharanatthaale nin krupayil
maranamatanjoru daasare nin
jeevasvaramathunartthaname,
kabareennudyaanatthinnaayu.

rakshakane, nin gaathratthe bhakshicchum nin
vilayerum rakthakkaasaa paanam cheythum
mrutharaayore naasham neekki jeevippi-
cchaniyenam ninne nokkunnavaril kaanthi.

mruthare jeevippippaanezhunnallum raajaa, mukilazhakinmelaaghoshithanaayeetunnu,
nayavaanmaar than munkompin naadam ketti-
ttankiyaninjethirelppaanaayu poyeetunnu.

uyirekunnon raajaavuyaratthil ninnazhunnalli,
jeevan mrutharaam evarkkum nalkunnu.
Kabarukalullil ninningavaravaruyirotezhunnettu
uyirekum ni-nne sthuthi cheytheetunnu.

ente shareeram bhakshicchen raktham paanam cheyvon
paathaalatthil - pokaanaayu vitaa, njaan
ennumavan jeevippaan angettheettu maricchathu njaan,
ennum kartthaa-thannarulinnu mahatthuvam.

naathaa! Thaavakamirulo-kam
ninnadhikaaram thaane-ngum
sleebaayaal jeevithare-kaa-
tthanpaal mukthi mrutharkke-ka.

sthothram! Mruthajeevapra-dane!
Kabareennetteetunno-ne!
Nin preshakathaathanuma-malan
roohaaykkum haaleluyyaa.

maramathinuyare, kartthaave!
Kallanu kittiya nin്re varam
thrithvatthe kondaati mari-
cchorum kykkondeetenam.

than maranatthaal-maranatthe
jeevippicchavanaam-dyvasuthaa!
Sthuthi dyvatthinne-nnaarkkaan
atiyaare poozheennettaname.

vellum shathrukkale ninnaal njangal-haa-
dveshikale methiccheetum nin-naamatthil
/tvyrikalil ninnum kaatthengale nee-haa-
/tshathrukkale la-jjippicchu.

moonnaammaniyilumenneratthum vandikkunnu-
/tjeevasleebaaye
nettiyilathine rooshmaa cheyyunnathu thaan njangal-
/tkkabhayam sanketham
raavum pakalum-dushtaneyum synya-ttheyum paayi-
/tcchathu kaattheetunnu.

vibhajicchaazhiye synyasamaksham vatiyaal mooshaa,
/tgatharaayi sraayel
kartthaaveshu sleebaayaale sheeyolum thura-
/tnnaa mruthareyetti
kabaril ninnum-parudeeserum jee-vithamaam vazhi kaa-
/tttiya mashihaa dhanyan.

sleebaaye vandippaanaay-heleni raajnji
nyapapattanamaam romayil ninnerushalemaarnnu
/tyoodanmaare kootti chonnevam:
/t“kaanicchituvin-sleebaa vacchoritam”
"njangalkkundoru pramukhan, nee-avanotaaraanjaal
mashihaathan sleebaayamarum-sthaanam kaanikkum”
/thaaleluyyaa - ennavaruracheythu.

ammaanuvel deveshan-tharuvil thoongi
eelshaadaayu thanayan veeran-thala thaazhtthi maricchu.
/taathmam maathram-tharuvil kyvittu;
/tnija saaraamsham meniyil nivasicchu.
Verpettaan nisaaramathaam-maanushamaam jeevan
vilapiccheetattunnathane-krooshicchor yoodar;
/thaaleluyyaa -kashtamavarkkennum.

naathan koottaayulla-thinaal-dushtane naam-petikkilla.
Than divyaayudha dhaari-kalaam-nammalkkunnathiyundaakum.

sleebaaye tholil thaangi-seeyonilninnum poyon
mrutharthannasthikalinmeethe - choriyatte karunappanineer.

moraaneesho nin kurishil - theteetunnatiyaarabhayam
saatthaaneennathu samrakshi - cchettaname vaanavaraaja.

sleebaa vaazhuka svarggatthil
sleebaa vaazhuka bhoomiyilum
sleebaa pallikal dayaraakal-
kkellaamaakaname kotta.

yerushalem gogultthaayil
krooshithanaameesho sthothram
paara pilarnnu than dhvaniyaal
mruthareri sthothram paati.
